subject: Re: I was wondering......
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I've heard if you like pretend to talk to then im your mind, and 
listen, and imagine them taling back, sometimes you actually get 
answers like that. I've done that with my dad, and there's times I 
swear we are talking two way--kinda mediumistically. I don't really 
hear the voice, but feel it, or feel the conversation. 

 frank-S

> Thanks Frank.....I didnt even think about it that way, they have 
some new things to learn before they can do that...kinda a duh moment

>   Rhonda
